headline: Accenture PLC (ACN) Trades at a Discount Despite Strong Cash Flow Profile
summary: Fiduciary Management Inc, an Investment Counsel, released its Q4 2025 investor letter. In its Investment Strategy Outlook, the fund reported solid long-term performance but acknowledged lagging broader indices amid a speculative, AI-driven market rally. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Equity markets posted strong gains in 2025, fueled by risk-seeking behavior and heavy [â€¦]

headline: CloudAvanti Appoints Brad Dever as Chief Commercial Officer and Managing Director
summary: CloudAvanti announced today that Brad Dever has joined the firm as Chief Commercial Officer and Managing Director, effective January 19. In this role, Dever will be responsible for leading CloudAvanti's commercial strategy, with a focus on client experience, sales execution, market expansion and strategic alliances across North America.
